data_table.description: ECG Serial Change, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ESMC5
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) I aVL V6 - 1ST ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead I or V6
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6

variable.name: ESMC6
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead II
Q amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm in leads III or aVF
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead II
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave equal to 1.0 mm amplitude in the majority of beats in lead aVF
QS pattern in each of leads III and aVF. (Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1.)

variable.name: ESMC7
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) V1-V5 - 1ST ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3 plus Q duration equal to 0.03 sec in any of leads V2, V3, V4, V5
Missing
QS pattern when initial R-wave is present in adjacent lead to the right on the chest, in any of leads V2-V6
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec, in any of leads V2, V3, V4, V5
QS pattern in all of leads V1, V2, and V3. (Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1)
Missing
QS pattern in lead V1 and V2. (Do not code in the presence of 3-1 or 7-1-1.)

variable.name: ESMC8
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) I aVL V6 - 1ST ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ESMC9
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) II III aVF - 1ST ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II

variable.name: ESMC10
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) V1-V5 - 1ST ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5

variable.name: ESMC11
variable.description: T wave (5x) I aVL V6 - 1ST ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads I, aVL, V6; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMC12
variable.description: T wave (5x) II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not coded in lead aVF

variable.name: ESMC13
variable.description: T wave (5x) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in any of leads V1-V5
T amplitude negative (flat), or diphasic (negative-positive or positive-negative type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm, in any of leads V1-V5
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase, in any of leads V3-V5
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads V3-V5; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMC14
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC15
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC16
variable.description: ST seg elevation (92x) V1-V5 - 1ST ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC17
variable.description: R (3x) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R

Left (optional code when 3-1 is not present): R amplitude > 15.0 mm but " 20.0 mm in lead I, or R amplitude in V5 or V6, plus S amplitude in V1 > 35.0 mm. (Measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

variable.name: ESMC18
variable.description: A-V conduction defect (6xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Short P-R interval. P-R interval < 0.12 sec in all beats of any two of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF

variable.name: ESMC19
variable.description: Ventricular conduction defect (7xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2 .(Code as 3-2 in addition if those criteria are met. 7-3 suppresses code 1-2-8.)
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF. (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R
Incomplete left bundle branch block. (Do not code in the presence of any codable Q- or QS-wave.) QRS duration = 0.10 sec and < 0.12 in the majority of beats of each of leads I, aVL, and V5 or V6

Complete left bundle branch block (LBBB). (Do not code in presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration = 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus R peak duration equal to 0.06 sec in a majority of beats (of the sam

Complete right bundle branch block (RBBB). (Do not code in the presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration = 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus: R' > R in V1 or V2; or QRS mainly upright, with R peak

variable.name: ESMC20
variable.description: Misc (9x) 1x - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Low QRS amplitude. QRS peak-to-peak amplitude < 5 mm in all beats in each of leads I, II, III, or < 10 mm in all beats in each of leads V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Check calibration before coding.)

variable.name: ESMC21
variable.description: Misc (9x) 3x - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: P-wave amplitude more or equal to 2.5 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF, in a majority of beats

variable.name: ESMC22
variable.description: Misc (9x) 5x - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: T-wave amplitude > 12 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: ESMC23
variable.description: U wave (blank) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC24
variable.description: Suppression 8 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC25
variable.description: Technical problem (98x) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC26
variable.description: Clear - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC27
variable.description: B1: suppression pattern (6xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC28
variable.description: C1: type of suppression (6xx) - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC29
variable.description: D1: bundle branch block - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC30
variable.description: E1: major Q I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC31
variable.description: F1: minor Q I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC32
variable.description: G1: major Q II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC33
variable.description: H1: minor Q II III aVF - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC34
variable.description: I1: major Q V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC35
variable.description: J1: minor Q V1-V5 - 1st ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC40
variable.description: Q-Qs pattern (1xx) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead I or V6
Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2 mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3 between V5 and V6. (All beats in lead V5 must have an initial R > 2 mm.)
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL

variable.name: ESMC41
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration equal to 0.03 sec in lead II
Missing
Q duration more or equal to 0.05 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave amplitude more or equal to 1.0 mm in the majority of beats in lead aVF
Q duration more or equal to 0.05 sec in lead aVF
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead II
QS pattern in lead II. Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec and < 0.05 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave more or equal to 1.0 mm amplitude in the majority of beats in aVF
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec and < 0.05 sec in lead aVF
Q amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm in leads III or aVF
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead II
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead III, plus a Q-wave more or equal to 1.0 mm amplitude in the majority of beats in lead aVF
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in lead aVF
QS pattern in each of leads III and aVF. (Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1.)

variable.name: ESMC42
variable.description: Q-QS pattern (1xx) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3 plus Q duration = 0.03 sec in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec in any of leads V1-V5
QS pattern when initial R-wave is present in adjacent lead to the right on the chest, in any of leads V2-V6
QS pattern in all of leads V1-V4 or V1-V5
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec, in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in any of leads V2-V5
QS pattern in all of leads V1, V2, and V3. (Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1)

Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2.0 mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3) between any of leads V2 and V3, V3 and V4, or V4 and V5. (All beats in the lead immediately to the right on the chest must have an initial R >
Missing
QS pattern in lead V1 and V2. (Do not code in the presence of 3-1 or 7-1-1.)

variable.name: ESMC43
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ESMC44
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ESMC45
variable.description: ST segment depression (4xx) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir = 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1-V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1-V5

variable.name: ESMC46
variable.description: T wave (5x) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads I, aVL, V6; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMC47
variable.description: T wave (5x) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not coded in lead aVF
Missing

variable.name: ESMC48
variable.description: T wave (5x) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in any of leads V2, V3, V4, V5
T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not coded in lead aVF
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads V3, V4, V5; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ESMC49
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC50
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF

variable.name: ESMC51
variable.description: ST segment elevation (92x) V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in lead V5 or ST segment elevation = 2.0 mm in any of leads V1-V4

variable.name: ESMC52
variable.description: R (3x) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R amplitude > 12.0 mm in lead aVL. (All criteria measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

Left (optional code when 3-1 is not present): R amplitude > 15.0 mm but " 20.0 mm in lead I, or R amplitude in V5 or V6, plus S amplitude in V1 > 35.0 mm. (Measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

variable.name: ESMC53
variable.description: AV conduction defect (6xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Short P-R interval. P-R interval < 0.12 sec in all beats of any two of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF

variable.name: ESMC54
variable.description: Ventricular conduction defect (7xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2 .(Code as 3-2 in addition if those criteria are met. 7-3 suppresses code 1-2-8.)
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF. (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R

Incomplete left bundle branch block. (Do not code in the presence of any codable Q- or QS-wave.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.10 sec and < 0.12 in the majority of beats of each of leads I, aVL, and V5 or V6

Complete right bundle branch block (RBBB). (Do not code in the presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus: R' > R in V1 or V2; or QRS mainly upright, with R peak

variable.name: ESMC55
variable.description: Misc (9x) 1x - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: Low QRS amplitude. QRS peak-to-peak amplitude < 5 mm in all beats in each of leads I, II, III, or < 10 mm in all beats in each of leads V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Check calibration before coding.)

variable.name: ESMC56
variable.description: Misc (9x) 3x - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
variable.value: P-wave amplitude more or equal to 2.5 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF, in a majority of beats

variable.name: ESMC57
variable.description: Misc (9x) 5x - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC58
variable.description: U wave (blank) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC59
variable.description: Suppression 8 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC60
variable.description: Technical problem (98x) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC61
variable.description: Clear - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC62
variable.description: B2: suppression pat (6xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC63
variable.description: C2: type of suppression (6xx) - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC64
variable.description: D2: bundle branch block - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC65
variable.description: E2: major Q I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC66
variable.description: F2: minor Q I aVL V6 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC67
variable.description: G2: major Q II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC68
variable.description: H2: minor Q II III aVF - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC69
variable.description: I2: major Q V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC70
variable.description: J2: minor Q V1-V5 - follow up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC71
variable.description: Visit or contact Year - Follow Up ECG [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC72
variable.description: Condition 1 - lead 1, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC73
variable.description: Condition 1 - lead 2, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC74
variable.description: Condition 1 - lead 3, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC75
variable.description: Condition 2 - lead 1, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC76
variable.description: Condition 2 - lead 2, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC77
variable.description: Condition 2 - lead 3, ED1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC78
variable.description: Condition 3 - lead 1, ED2, 3, 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC79
variable.description: Condition 3 - lead 2, ED2, 3, 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC80
variable.description: Condition 3 - lead 3, ED2, 3, 4 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC81
variable.description: Condition 4 - lead 1, ED5, 6, 7 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC82
variable.description: Condition 4 - lead 2, ED5, 6, 7 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC83
variable.description: Condition 4 - lead 3, ED5, 6, 7 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC84
variable.description: Condition 5 - lead 1, EV 1-EV 8 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC85
variable.description: Condition 5 - lead 2, EV 1-EV 8 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC86
variable.description: Condition 5 - lead 3, EV 1-EV 8 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC87
variable.description: Condition 7 - lead 1, ED2, 5, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC88
variable.description: Condition 7 - lead 2, ED2, 5, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC89
variable.description: Condition 7 - lead 3, ED2, 5, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC90
variable.description: Condition 8 - lead 1, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC91
variable.description: Condition 8 - lead 2, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC92
variable.description: Condition 8 - lead 3, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC93
variable.description: Condition 9 - lead 1, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC94
variable.description: Condition 9 - lead 2, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC95
variable.description: Condition 9 - lead 3, EV 1 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC96
variable.description: Condition 10- lead 1, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC97
variable.description: Condition 10- lead 2, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC98
variable.description: Condition 10- lead 3, EV 2 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC99
variable.description: Condition 11- lead 1, EV 6 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC100
variable.description: Condition 11- lead 2, EV 6 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC101
variable.description: Condition 11- lead 3, EV 6 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]

variable.name: ESMC102
variable.description: Condition 12- lead 1, ED3, 6, EV 3 [ECG Serial Change, exam 4]
